DLG T
The telescope points towards the woods, where the star fell. 

DLG B
You slept in late.

DLG E
The sheets are rumpled.

DLG P
You were up all night again? Did you see anything?

DLG D
*woof*

DLG W
Gentle waves keep the driftwood on shore.

DLG V
TV GUY: ...light mist today with a 30% chance of frogs...

DLG M
The bottle contains a message in a forgotten language.
